data_table.description: Echocardiography: Cardiac Strain, Offspring Exam 8. Speckle tracking stain based analyses were performed on digitally recorded 2D images collected from participants who attended Offspring examination 8 and underwent standardized echocardiography. Speckle tracking based measures were performed on a total of three image views per participant: apical 2 chamber view (a2ch), apical 4 chamber view (a4ch), and the parasternal short axis view at the papillary muscle level (sax-pm). All measures were performed using the Cardiac Performance Analysis software package (TomTec Imaging, Germany).

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: sax_pm_ave_circstrain
variable.description: Average circumferential strain (across 6 regions) measured in the short axis view at the papillary muscle level

variable.name: sax_pm_ave_circstrain_t2p
variable.description: Average time-to-peak circumferential strain (across 6 regions) measured in the short axis view at the papillary muscle level

variable.name: sax_pm_sd_circstrain_t2p
variable.description: SD of the time-to-peak circumferential strain values (across 6 regions) measured in the short axis view at the papillary muscle level

variable.name: sax_pm_ave_radstrain
variable.description: Average radial strain (across 6 regions) measured in the short axis view at the papillary muscle level

variable.name: sax_pm_ave_radstrain_t2p
variable.description: Average time-to-peak radial strain (across 6 regions) measured in the short axis view at the papillary muscle level

variable.name: sax_pm_sd_radstrain_t2p
